resources.string: English for Kids
Hello world!
Settings
He is drawn into a terrifying alternate reality that holds answers to the nightmares that have plagued her since childhood.
A televised fight to the death in which two teenagers from each of the twelve Districts of Panem are chosen at random to compete.
The Nazis set up a secret base on the moon in 1945 where they hide out and plan to return to power in 2018.
A team of explorers discover a clue to the origins of mankind on Earth, leading them on a journey to the darkest corners of the universe.
Survivors of a nuclear attack are grouped together for days in the basement, where fear and dwindling supplies wear away at their dynamic.
